title: China’s Move to Ride on Korean Wave Leaves Seoul Divided - WSJ
text:

Chinese movie and TV-show distributors as well as China’s Internet giants are looking to tap into South Korea’s magic touch by joining with Korean content creators or by acquiring them outright.
